remarks: Value of the identity functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
idfuval.i $e |- I = ( idFunc ` C ) $.
idfuval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
idfuval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
idfuval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
idfuval $p |- ( ph -> I = <. ( _I |` B ) , ( z e. ( B X. B ) |-> ( _I |` ( H ` z ) ) ) >. ) $.
$d B z $.
$d C z $.
$d H z $.
$d ph z $.
